original: oṃ namaḥ netratantrāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ netra tantrāya

original: pratyakṣavastuviṣayāya jagaddhitāya viśvasthitipralayasambhavakāraṇāya /
analyzed: pratyakṣa vastu viṣayāya jagat hitāya viśva sthiti pralaya sambhava kāraṇāya

original: sarvātmane vijitakopamanobhavāya tubhyaṃ namas tribuvanaprabhave śivāya // AvBhBhS_1
analyzed: sarvātmane vijita kopa manobhavāya tubhyam namaḥ tribuvana prabhave śivāya

original: satyaṃ na vedmi kim ahaṃ yad agocaro 'si vācaspater api girām kim utāsmadādeḥ /
analyzed: satyam na vedmi kim aham yat agocaraḥ si vācaspateḥ api girām kim uta asmad ādeḥ

original: bhaktis tathāpi bhavato guṇakīrtaneṣu yan māṃ niyojayati kiṃ tad ahaṃ karomi // AvBhBhS_2
analyzed: bhaktiḥ tathā api bhavataḥ guṇa kīrtaneṣu yat mām niyojayati kim tat aham karomi

original: khārkenduvahnimarudātmamahīpayobhir aṣṭabhir eva tanubhir bhavatā samaste /
analyzed: kha arka indu vahni marut ātma mahī payobhiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ eva tanubhiḥ bhavatā samaste

original: vyāpte jagaty aparam icchati yo 'tra vaktum ko 'nyo hatatrapatayā sadṛśo 'sti tena // AvBhBhS_3
analyzed: vyāpte jagati aparam icchati vaktum kaḥ nyaḥ hata trapa tayā sadṛśaḥ sti tena

original: dhṛtyādibhiḥ svatanuvṛttibhir eva yadvad eko bhavān vahati samprati lokayātrām /
analyzed: dhṛti ādibhiḥ sva tanu vṛttibhiḥ eva yadvat ekaḥ bhavān vahati samprati lokayātrām

original: tadvad vibho yadi jagaty aparo 'sti kaścin nirmatsarāḥ kim api na pravadanti santaḥ // AvBhBhS_4
analyzed: tadvat vibho yadi jagati aparaḥ sti kaścid nirmatsarāḥ kim api na pravadanti santaḥ

original: yogād apāstatamso bhuvanatraye 'pi mukhyāḥ pitāmahapurandaraviṣṇavo 'pi /
analyzed: yogāt bhuvanatraye mukhyāḥ pitāmaha purandara viṣṇavaḥ

original: adyāpi deva na vidanti kṛtaprayatnās tattvaṃ taveti tad aho mahad indrajālam // AvBhBhS_5
analyzed: adyā api deva na vidanti kṛta prayatnāḥ tattvam tava iti tat aho mahat indrajālam

original: bhāvodbhavasthitivipatkaraṇapravṛttau saṃjñā vibhinnaracanās tvayi sambhavanti /
analyzed: bhāva udbhava sthiti vipad karaṇa pravṛttau saṃjñāḥ vibhinna racanāḥ tvayi sambhavanti

original: sāmye sthitaḥ pratinivṛttasamastakāryo nendro na viṣṇur asi nāpi pitāmaho 'si // AvBhBhS_6
analyzed: sāmye sthitaḥ pratinivṛtta samasta kāryaḥ na indraḥ na viṣṇuḥ asi na api si

original: kecid bhavantam anupādhim anāmarūpam vijñānam eva paramārthatayā prapannāḥ /
analyzed: kecid bhavantam an upādhim a nāma rūpam vijñānam eva parama artha tayā prapannāḥ

original: anye tridhātuparikalpanayā viśuddham ūcuḥ svaśāstrasamayaṃ paripālayantaḥ // AvBhBhS_7
analyzed: anye tri dhātu parikalpanayā viśuddham ūcuḥ sva śāstra samayam paripālayantaḥ

original: sāṃkhyaiḥ samastajagadudbhavakāraṇāni proktāni yāni khalu sattvarajastamāṃsi /
analyzed: sāṃkhyaiḥ samasta jagat udbhava kāraṇāni proktāni yāni khalu sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi

original: rūpāṇi tāny api tavaiva samagraśakteḥ kiṃ nātra yat parigataṃ bhuvi śaktibhis te // AvBhBhS_8
analyzed: rūpāṇi tāni api tava eva samagra śakteḥ kim nā atra yat parigatam bhuvi śaktibhiḥ te

original: nityaṃ vināśipadarūpam anekam ekam ugraṃ praśāntam aguṇaṃ guṇasaṃnibaddham /
analyzed: nityam vināśi pada rūpam anekam ekam ugram praśāntam aguṇam guṇa saṃnibaddham

original: saṃsāriṇaṃ vaśinam adhurvam asvatantram evaṃ bhavantam asakṛt kavayaḥ stuvanti // AvBhBhS_9
analyzed: saṃsāriṇam vaśinam a dhurvam a svatantram evam bhavantam asakṛt kavayaḥ stuvanti

original: vācām atītaviṣayo nirupākhyabhāvāt prokto 'si śūnyam iti kaiścid asatpratijñaiḥ /
analyzed: vācām atīta viṣayaḥ nirupākhya bhāvāt proktaḥ si śūnyam iti kaiścid asat pratijñaiḥ

original: tvām eva kecid api vācakavācyayogāt santaṃ viśeṣaṇavaśāt parikalpayanti // AvBhBhS_10
analyzed: tvām eva kecid api vācaka vācya yogāt santam viśeṣaṇa vaśāt parikalpayanti

original: ādyantayos tribuvanasya bhavantam eva yaṃ vaidikāḥ puruṣam āhur abhedam ādyam /
analyzed: ādi antayoḥ tribuvanasya bhavantam eva yam vaidikāḥ puruṣam āhuḥ abhedam ādyam

original: bhūyas tam eva jananapralayāntarāle saṃsārajālam iti jātavikāram ūcuḥ // AvBhBhS_11
analyzed: bhūyas tam eva janana pralaya antarāle saṃsāra jālam iti jāta vikāram ūcuḥ

original: ātmānam ātmani yadā svayam ātmanaiva saṃyamya tiṣṭhasi nimīlitasarvaśakte /
analyzed: ātmānam ātmani yadā svayam ātmanā eva saṃyamya tiṣṭhasi nimīlita sarva śakte

original: līnaṃ tadā tvayi jagat khalu tāvad āste yāvat tavodbhavati nātha punaḥ sisṛkṣā // AvBhBhS_12
analyzed: līnam tadā tvayi jagat khalu tāvat āste yāvat tava udbhavati nātha punar sisṛkṣā

original: tvattaḥ paraṃ jagati nātha na cāsti kiṃcin nāṇuḥ kvacin na ca mahān bhavataḥ sakāśāt /
analyzed: tvattaḥ param jagati nātha na ca asti kiṃcid na aṇuḥ kvacid na ca mahān bhavataḥ sakāśāt

original: sarvātmako 'si bhavataiva samastam etad antaḥkṛtaṃ nanu jagan maṇineva sūtram // AvBhBhS_13
analyzed: sarva ātmakaḥ si bhavatā eva samastam etat antaḥkṛtam nanu jagat maṇinā iva sūtram

original: cetāṃsi yāni sukhaduḥkhaviśeṣabhāñji ye ca pradhānapariṇāmavikārabhedāḥ /
analyzed: cetāṃsi yāni sukha duḥkha viśeṣa bhāñji ye ca pradhāna pariṇāma vikāra bhedāḥ

original: tvaṃ deva janmani punaḥ pralaye ca teṣām hetuḥ samastapayasām iva toyarāśiḥ // AvBhBhS_14
analyzed: tvam deva janmani punar pralaye ca teṣām hetuḥ samasta payasām iva toyarāśiḥ

original: astās tvayā suraguro svatanu yadaiva khātmānalānilajalāvanicandrasūryāḥ /
analyzed: astāḥ tvayā suraguro sva tanu yadā eva kha ātma anala anila jala avani candra sūryāḥ

original: loke parasya bhavatā nanu kāraṇasya mūle tadaiva nihitaḥ sakale kuṭhāraḥ // AvBhBhS_15
analyzed: loke parasya bhavatā nanu kāraṇasya mūle tadā eva nihitaḥ sakale kuṭhāraḥ

original: stauti prasahya tava ṣoḍaśadhā vibhajya mūrtiṃ pramāṇaracano munir akṣapādaḥ /
analyzed: stauti prasahya tava ṣoḍaśadhā vibhajya mūrtim pramāṇa racanaḥ muniḥ akṣapādaḥ

original: dravyādivasturacanābhir upāttabhede vaiśeṣike kaṇabhujāpi nanu stuto 'si // AvBhBhS_16
analyzed: dravya ādi vastu racanābhiḥ upātta bhede vaiśeṣike kaṇabhujā api nanu stutaḥ si

original: badhnāti kācid api śaktir anantaśakter kṣetrajñam apratihatā bhavapāśajālaiḥ /
analyzed: badhnāti kācid api śaktiḥ ananta śakteḥ kṣetrajñam a pratihatā bhava pāśa jālaiḥ

original: jñānāsinā ca vinikṛtya guṇān aśeṣān anyā karoty abhimukhaṃ puruṣaṃ vimuktau // AvBhBhS_17
analyzed: jñāna asinā ca vinikṛtya guṇān aśeṣān anyā karoti abhimukham puruṣam vimuktau

original: ekāṃ bata cyutasamastabhavapravṛttim āhur vimuktim iti śāntatamām avasthām /
analyzed: ekām bata cyuta samasta bhava pravṛttim āhuḥ vimuktim iti śāntatamām avasthām

original: sthityudbhavapralayinīm aparām avasthām saṃsāriṇīm iti vadanti tavaiva santaḥ // AvBhBhS_18
analyzed: sthiti udbhava pralayinīm aparām avasthām saṃsāriṇīm iti vadanti tava eva santaḥ

original: ajñānatīvratimiropahataprakāśās tvaddūṣaṇaṃ prati vinaṣṭadhiyo 'pi santaḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna tīvra timira upahata prakāśāḥ tvad dūṣaṇam prati vinaṣṭa dhiyaḥ pi santaḥ

original: tāvat tyajanti na bhavaṃ bhagavaṃs tvayaiva yāvat svaśaktikiraṇair na vibodhitāḥ syuḥ // AvBhBhS_19
analyzed: tāvat tyajanti na bhavam bhagavan tvayā eva yāvat sva śakti kiraṇaiḥ na vibodhitāḥ syuḥ

original: guhyaṃ guhāśrayam ajam paramaṃ pavitram ekaṃ vibhuṃ sakalavāṅmayabījam ādyam /
analyzed: guhyam guhā āśrayam ajam paramam pavitram ekam vibhum sakala vāc maya bījam ādyam

original: samyak prayuktam abhivāñchitahtubhūtam āhur bhavantam apare nanu śabdatattvam // AvBhBhS_20
analyzed: samyak prayuktam abhivāñchita htu bhūtam āhuḥ bhavantam apare nanu śabda tattvam

original: tīrthakriyāvyasaninaḥ svamanīṣikābhir urprekṣya tattvam iti yad yad amī vadanti /
analyzed: tīrtha kriyā vyasaninaḥ sva manīṣikābhiḥ tattvam iti yat yat amī vadanti

original: tat tattvam eva bhavato 'sti na kiṃcid anyat saṃjñāsu kevalam ayaṃ viduṣāṃ vivādaḥ // AvBhBhS_21
analyzed: tat tattvam eva bhavataḥ sti na kiṃcid anyat saṃjñāsu kevalam ayam viduṣām vivādaḥ

original: sarvajñabījam avikāram aluptaśaktim niḥśreyasābhyudayamārgavidhānahetum /
analyzed: sarvajña bījam avikāram alupta śaktim niḥśreyasa abhyudaya mārga vidhāna hetum

original: tvām eva deva guravaḥ prathame 'pi samyag ārādhya tīrthakarabhā mahimānam āpuḥ // AvBhBhS_22
analyzed: tvām eva deva guravaḥ prathame samyak ārādhya tīrthakarabhāḥ mahimānam āpuḥ  /

original: sarvajñātā yad api lakṣaṇayā parasya mukhyā tathāpi bhavataḥ parameśvaratvāt /
analyzed: sarvajñātā yat api lakṣaṇayā parasya mukhyā tathā api bhavataḥ parameśvara tvāt

original: svātantryam apy anupacāram upaiti yogam tvayy eva nātha jagataḥ khalu kartṛbhāvāt // AvBhBhS_23
analyzed: svātantryam api anupacāram upaiti yogam tvayi eva nātha jagataḥ khalu kartṛ bhāvāt

original: dṛśyena kaścid api gacchati vastujātam anyo 'numānasamayair aparo 'pi śabdaiḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyena kaścid api gacchati vastu jātam anyaḥ śabdaiḥ

original: pratyakṣavastu bhavataḥ punar akrameṇa sarvaṃ karāmalakavad viditaṃ prameyam // AvBhBhS_24
analyzed: pratyakṣa vastu bhavataḥ punar akrameṇa sarvam kara āmalaka vat viditam prameyam

original: asyātmano viṣayiṇaḥ paratantravṛtter anyaś ca nātha jagataḥ prakṛteḥ parasya /
analyzed: asya ātmanaḥ viṣayiṇaḥ paratantra vṛtteḥ anyaḥ ca nātha jagataḥ prakṛteḥ parasya

original: saṃyojane ca viratau ca paro 'si hetuḥ saṃsāracakraparivartanayantravāhaḥ // AvBhBhS_25
analyzed: saṃyojane ca viratau ca hetuḥ saṃsāra cakra parivartana yantra vāhaḥ

original: kurvan muhuḥ svayam atandritayāpi buddhyā karmāṇi śāstraviṣayopanibandhanāni /
analyzed: kurvan muhur svayam atandritayā api buddhyā karmāṇi śāstra viṣaya upanibandhanāni

original: saṃyujyate samucitena tu yatphalena tacceṣṭitasya phalam apratimaṃ tavaiva // AvBhBhS_26
analyzed: saṃyujyate samucitena tu yat phalena tat ceṣṭitasya phalam apratimam tava eva

original: utsāhaśaktirahitān vikalān apuṇyān mandān nirastasamayānn aghṛṇānn asatyān /
analyzed: utsāha śakti rahitān vikalān apuṇyān mandān nirasta samayān a ghṛṇān asatyān

original: avāñchitena viniyojayatā phalena luptas tvayā puruṣakāraviśeṣavāda // AvBhBhS_27
analyzed: a vāñchitena viniyojayatā phalena luptaḥ tvayā puruṣakāra viśeṣa vāda

original: karmāṇi vedavihitāni sukhapradāni pretyaiti tatphalam idaṃ phalam antavac ca /
analyzed: karmāṇi veda vihitāni sukha pradāni pretya eti tad phalam idam phalam antavat ca

original: tvacchāsane sukham anantam aśeṣadoṣa- ploṣāya bhaktivihitām praṇatiṃ yad āhuḥ // AvBhBhS_28
analyzed: tvad śāsane sukham anantam aśeṣa doṣa ploṣāya bhakti vihitām praṇatim yat āhuḥ

original: prākāmyam ātmani yadā prakaṭīkaroṣi vyaktīḥ pratikṣaṇam apūrvatayā dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: prākāmyam ātmani yadā prakaṭīkaroṣi vyaktīḥ pratikṣaṇam apūrva tayā dadhānaḥ

original: tvayy eva so 'pi bhagavan bhajate 'rthavattām prayo 'vidagdharacitaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādaḥ // AvBhBhS_29
analyzed: tvayi eva saḥ pi bhagavan bhajate ṛthavat tām prayaḥ vidagdha racitaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga vādaḥ

original: yat tīrthikair jagati janmabhir aprameyair nāsādyate padam iti svamateṣu gītam /
analyzed: yat tīrthikaiḥ jagati janmabhiḥ aprameyaiḥ na āsādyate padam iti sva mateṣu gītam

original: buddhyaikajanmikam iti bruvatāṃ vigṛhya yeṣāṃ tvayā nanu kṛtaś caraṇaḥ śiraḥsu // AvBhBhS_30
analyzed: buddhyā aikajanmikam iti bruvatām vigṛhya yeṣām tvayā nanu kṛtaḥ caraṇaḥ śiraḥsu

original: lubdhā malīmasadhiyaḥ samayād apetā rāhoparaktamanaso vaśino 'py asantaḥ /
analyzed: lubdhāḥ malīmasa dhiyaḥ samayāt apetāḥ rāha uparakta manasaḥ vaśinaḥ pi asantaḥ

original: tvacchāsane vihitaliṅgaparigraheṇa mucyanta ity atimahāṃs tava siṃhanādaḥ // AvBhBhS_31
analyzed: tvad śāsane vihita liṅga parigraheṇa mucyante iti ati mahān tava siṃhanādaḥ

original: avyāhatasya bhagavan bhavadāgamasya cintāmaṇer iva mahān asamaḥ prabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: avyāhatasya bhagavan bhavat āgamasya cintāmaṇeḥ iva mahān asamaḥ prabhāvaḥ

original: samyag vidhānavihitāṃ yad avāpya dīkṣāṃ jñānād ṛte 'pi khalu kevalatām upaiti // AvBhBhS_32
analyzed: samyak vidhāna vihitām yat avāpya dīkṣām jñānāt ṛte khalu kevala tām upaiti

original: jñānaṃ tiraḥkṛtam idam paśuvāsanābhir āstāṃ yad ātmani vimuktiphalasya bījam /
analyzed: jñānam tiras kṛtam idam paśu vāsanābhiḥ āstām yat ātmani vimukti phalasya bījam

original: uddhāriṇeva bhagavan bhavadāgamena sampāditaṃ bhavati mokṣaphalaprapūrtyai // AvBhBhS_33
analyzed: uddhāriṇā iva bhagavan bhavat āgamena sampāditam bhavati mokṣa phala prapūrtyai

original: jantor yadā tava kadācid anugrahecchā kṣīṇāśayo bhavati janmabhir aprameyaiḥ /
analyzed: jantoḥ yadā tava kadācid anugraha icchā kṣīṇa āśayaḥ bhavati janmabhiḥ aprameyaiḥ

original: saṃsārajālam ativāhya tavaiva śāntim ātyantikīṃ vrajati bodhavivarjito 'pi // AvBhBhS_34
analyzed: saṃsāra jālam ativāhya tava eva śāntim ātyantikīm vrajati bodha vivarjitaḥ pi

original: etac caturdaśavidhaṃ bhuvanaṃ samastam saṃsāramaṇḍalam avāntarabhedabhinnam /
analyzed: etat caturdaśavidham bhuvanam samastam saṃsāra maṇḍalam avāntarabheda bhinnam

original: tvam pāsi haṃsi vidadhāsi yādṛcchayeti matvā na lipyata iti pravadanti santaḥ // AvBhBhS_35
analyzed: tvam pāsi haṃsi vidadhāsi yādṛcchayā iti matvā na lipyate iti pravadanti santaḥ

original: aiśvaryam apratihataṃ sahajo virāgas tṛptir nisargajanitā vaśitendriyeṣu /
analyzed: aiśvaryam a pratihatam sahajaḥ virāgaḥ tṛptiḥ nisarga janitā vaśitā indriyeṣu

original: ātyantikaṃ sukhaṃ anāvaraṇā ca śaktir jñānaṃ ca sarvaviṣayaṃ bhagavaṃs tavaiva // AvBhBhS_36
analyzed: ātyantikam sukham anāvaraṇā ca śaktiḥ jñānam ca sarva viṣayam bhagavan tava eva

original: yatnād upāttatamaso 'pi hi yad durāpam ātyantikaṃ sukham apāstasamastaduḥkham /
analyzed: yatnāt upātta tamasaḥ api hi yat durāpam ātyantikam sukham apāsta samasta duḥkham

original: nītāḥ kharoṣṭrataravo 'pi tad ity aho te svātantryam apratihataṃ bhuvanatraye 'pi // AvBhBhS_37
analyzed: nītāḥ khara uṣṭra taravaḥ pi tat iti aho te svātantryam a pratihatam bhuvanatraye pi

original: yenāmalasphuritaratnaśikhāvitāno haimīkṛto nipatatā sakalaḥ sumeruḥ /
analyzed: yena amala sphurita ratna śikhā vitānaḥ haimīkṛtaḥ nipatatā sakalaḥ sumeruḥ

original: tasyātulaṃ phalam idaṃ tava śūkrabindor ekasya yat kanakabhūṣaṇam āpa lokaḥ // AvBhBhS_38
analyzed: tasya atulam phalam idam tava śūkrabindoḥ ekasya yat kanaka bhūṣaṇam āpa lokaḥ

original: kālena saṃcitam apuṇyam anantakalpaṃ lokatrayasya yad abhūt tripuraprakāram /
analyzed: kālena saṃcitam apuṇyam ananta kalpam lokatrayasya yat abhūt tripura prakāram

original: dagdhaṃ tvayā tad iti samyag avetya kasya mūḍhād ṛte bhavati na tvayi pakṣapātaḥ // AvBhBhS_39
analyzed: dagdham tvayā tat iti samyak avetya kasya mūḍhāt ṛte bhavati na tvayi pakṣapātaḥ

original: kṣīrodasāramathanapratilabdhajanma vitrāsitatridaśasaṃhati kālakūṭam /
analyzed: kṣīroda sāra mathana pratilabdha janma vitrāsita tridaśa saṃhati kālakūṭam

original: nirmatsareṇa pibatā jagato hitāya pītas tvayaiva sakalo nanu sādhuvādaḥ // AvBhBhS_40
analyzed: nirmatsareṇa pibatā jagataḥ hitāya pītaḥ tvayā eva sakalaḥ nanu sādhuvādaḥ

original: śāntātmanāpi bhavatā bhagavan prasahya netrodbhavena dahatā dahanena kāmam /
analyzed: śānta ātmanā api bhavatā bhagavan prasahya netra udbhavena dahatā dahanena kāmam

original: alpīyaso 'pi mahatāṃ samatikramasya manye janāya viṣamaḥ kathito vipākaḥ // AvBhBhS_41
analyzed: alpīyasaḥ pi mahatām samatikramasya manye janāya viṣamaḥ kathitaḥ vipākaḥ

original: snehād vidhāya dayitāṃ vapuṣo 'rdhabhāge dhuryas tathāpi bhagavañ chamināṃ tvam eva /
analyzed: snehāt vidhāya dayitām vapuṣaḥ ṛdha bhāge dhuryaḥ tathā api tvam eva

original: trailokyavismayakṛtāṃ tava ceṣṭitānām adyāpi kaścid api nānukṛtiṃ karoti // AvBhBhS_42
analyzed: trailokya vismaya kṛtām tava ceṣṭitānām adyā api kaścid api nā anukṛtim karoti

original: uccais tiraḥkṛtam idam bhuvanaṃ samastaṃ yogaprabhāvajanitena balena yena /
analyzed: uccais tiraḥkṛtam idam bhuvanam samastam yoga prabhāva janitena balena yena

original: tasya prajāpatisutasya hṛtaḥ prasahya garvas tvayeti bata kasya na vismayo 'tra // AvBhBhS_43
analyzed: tasya prajāpati sutasya hṛtaḥ prasahya garvaḥ tvayā iti bata kasya na

original: aṅguṣṭhakena bhavatā vinipīḍitasya yasyāsavo na vigatāḥ sahasā kathaṃcit /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhakena bhavatā vinipīḍitasya yasya asavaḥ na vigatāḥ sahasā kathaṃcid

original: yatnāt sa eva vijito hariṇā cireṇa nītyā daśānana iti kva nu vismayo 'yam // AvBhBhS_44
analyzed: yatnāt saḥ eva vijitaḥ hariṇā cireṇa nītyā daśānanaḥ iti kva nu vismayaḥ yam

original: mandākinī kanakapaṅkajapārijāta- puṣpādhivāsitajalā nabhasaḥ patantī /
analyzed: mandākinī kanaka paṅkaja pārijāta puṣpa adhivāsita jalā nabhasaḥ patantī

original: lagnā tuṣārakaṇikeva jaṭāgrabhāge kenāpareṇa bhavateva dhṛtānugṛhya // AvBhBhS_45
analyzed: lagnā tuṣāra kaṇikā iva jaṭā agra bhāge kena apareṇa bhavatā iva dhṛtā anugṛhya

original: āstāṃ tavānyad api tāvad atulyakakṣyam aiśvaryam īśvarapadasya nimittabhūtam /
analyzed: āstām tava anyat api tāvat atulya kakṣyam aiśvaryam īśvara padasya nimitta bhūtam

original: tvacchepaso 'pi bhagavan na gato 'vasānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pitāmahayutaḥ kim utāparasya // AvBhBhS_46
analyzed: tvad śepasaḥ pi bhagavat na gataḥ vasānam viṣṇuḥ pitāmaha yutaḥ kim uta aparasya

original: śvetasya mṛtyudamanāntaravartino 'pi sūnāpaśor iva vadhāvasare sthitasya /
analyzed: śvetasya sūnā paśoḥ iva vadha avasare sthitasya

original: trāṇaṃ nigṛhya bhavatā yad akāri tasya tat kasya vismayam alaṃ na karoti loke // AvBhBhS_47
analyzed: trāṇam nigṛhya bhavatā yat akāri tasya tat kasya vismayam alam na karoti loke

original: prītena yadvad upamanyur apāstamanyuḥ kṣīrodasaṃvibhajanena kṛtas tvayāsau /
analyzed: prītena yadvat upamanyuḥ apāsta manyuḥ kṣīroda saṃvibhajanena kṛtaḥ tvayā asau

original: tadvad vibho yadi jagaty aparo 'si kaścin nirmucya matsaram amī pravadanti santaḥ // AvBhBhS_48
analyzed: tadvat vibho yadi jagati aparaḥ si kaścid nirmucya matsaram amī pravadanti santaḥ

original: vṛtradviṣaḥ sakuliśasya bhujasya śaktir uttambhitā vihasatā bhavatā tathaiva /
analyzed: vṛtradviṣaḥ sa kuliśasya bhujasya śaktiḥ uttambhitā vihasatā bhavatā tathā eva

original: pūṣṇas tathaiva daśaneṣu bhagasya cākṣṇor dakṣasya ca kratuphale mamatā nirastā // AvBhBhS_49
analyzed: pūṣṇaḥ tathā eva daśaneṣu bhagasya ca akṣṇoḥ dakṣasya ca kratu phale mamatā nirastā  /

original: viṣṇuprajāpatipurandaralokapālais tiryaksurāsuranarair aparaiś ca divyaiḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu prajāpati purandara lokapālaiḥ tiryak sura asura naraiḥ aparaiḥ ca divyaiḥ

original: loke yathā paśupate tava kalpitāni sthānāni tadvad aparasya vadantu kasya // AvBhBhS_50
analyzed: loke yathā paśupate tava kalpitāni sthānāni tadvat aparasya vadantu kasya

original: śakrātmajasya nijaśārṅgarathāṅgapāṇau kṛṣṇe sthite 'pi śakalīkṛtadānavendre /
analyzed: śakrātmajasya nija śārṅga rathāṅga pāṇau kṛṣṇe sthite śakalīkṛta dānava indre

original: droṇāpageyakṛpakarṇabhayārditasya śāṃ śāṃkara tvam akṛtha bhṛśam arjunasya // AvBhBhS_51
analyzed: droṇa āpageya kṛpa karṇa bhaya arditasya śām śāṃkara tvam akṛtha bhṛśam arjunasya

original: ārādhitena bhagavan bhavatā hiraṇya- vṛṣṭiṃ maruttanṛpateḥ kiratā yiyakṣoḥ /
analyzed: ārādhitena bhagavan bhavatā hiraṇya vṛṣṭim marutta nṛpateḥ kiratā yiyakṣoḥ

original: ye khyāpitā jagati bhaktajanaprasādās tan nāstutaṃ tava vibho parameśvaratvam // AvBhBhS_52
analyzed: ye khyāpitāḥ jagati bhakta jana prasādāḥ tat na a stutam tava vibho parameśvara tvam

original: tīvravratasya kaṇadhūmanipātatapta- sarvendriyasya bhavatā bhṛgunandanasya /
analyzed: tīvra vratasya kaṇa dhūma nipāta tapta sarva indriyasya bhavatā bhṛgunandanasya

original: tuṣṭena śarma yad akāri tadā sa śukraḥ śītoṣṇavātajaladair divi bhāsamānaḥ // AvBhBhS_53
analyzed: tuṣṭena śarma yat akāri tadā sa śukraḥ śīta uṣṇa vāta jaladaiḥ divi bhāsamānaḥ

original: etāni pāsi bhuvanāni yadā vigṛhya seyaṃ vibhūtir atulā tava tāvad āstām /
analyzed: etāni pāsi bhuvanāni yadā vigṛhya sā iyam vibhūtiḥ atulā tava tāvat āstām

original: dakṣaprasūtim api te bhvanatraye 'smin kaścin na vetti bhavatā saha ko vivādaḥ // AvBhBhS_54
analyzed: dakṣa prasūtim api te bhvana traye smin kaścid na vetti bhavatā saha kaḥ vivādaḥ

original: unmārgavarti guṇadoṣavivekamandam ugraṃ malīmasam asaṃyatam alpasāram /
analyzed: unmārga varti guṇa doṣa viveka mandam ugram malīmasam asaṃyatam alpa sāram

original: bhītārthināśana dayāpara lokanātha deva prasīda mama cittam idaṃ praśādhi // AvBhBhS_55
analyzed: bhīta arthi nāśana dayā para loka nātha deva prasīda mama cittam idam praśādhi

original: etāni deva capalāni durāśayāni lubdhāni ramyaviṣayopanibandhanāni /
analyzed: etāni deva capalāni durāśayāni lubdhāni ramya viṣaya upanibandhanāni

original: durdāntavājisadṛśāny avidheyabhāvād vaśyāni me kuru sadaiva ṣaḍindriyāni // AvBhBhS_56
analyzed: durdānta vāji sadṛśāni avidheya bhāvāt vaśyāni me kuru sadā eva ṣaṣ indriyāni

original: nandīśvarasya manujasya sato 'tikāṣṭhaṃ kālena mṛtyum acireṇa ninīṣitasya /
analyzed: nandīśvarasya manujasya tikāṣṭham kālena mṛtyum acireṇa ninīṣitasya

original: sarvātmanā samatayā yad akāri tuṣṭyā nāścaryam etad abhavan na ca bhāvi nāsti // AvBhBhS_57
analyzed: sarva ātmanā sama tayā yat akāri tuṣṭyā na āścaryam etat abhavat na ca bhāvi nā asti

original: saṃsārapāśavaśam etad anīśam īśa mithyā kutarkatimiropahataprakāśam /
analyzed: saṃsāra pāśa vaśam etat anīśam īśa mithyā kutarka timira upahata prakāśam

original: ceto mama kṣapitamanmatha dagdhakāla satsevite pathi niyojaya devadeva // AvBhBhS_58
analyzed: cetaḥ mama kṣapita manmatha dagdha kāla sat sevite pathi niyojaya devadeva

original: kāyānubandhibhir anekavidhair apāyai rāgādibhiś ca manasi pratilabdhabhāvaiḥ /
analyzed: kāya anubandhibhiḥ anekavidhaiḥ apāyaiḥ rāga ādibhiḥ ca manasi pratilabdha bhāvaiḥ

original: mūḍhaḥ pṛthak pṛthag aham pravilupyamānas tvattaḥ paraṃ kathaya kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi // AvBhBhS_59
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ pṛthak pṛthak aham pravilupyamānaḥ tvattaḥ param kathaya kam śaraṇam vrajāmi  /

original: āyāsakena khalu kāmapiśācakena krodhagraheṇa ca punar niravagraheṇa /
analyzed: āyāsakena khalu kāma piśācakena krodha graheṇa ca punar niravagraheṇa

original: grastasya viklavadhiyaḥ pravimuktihetor yat kṛtyam atra mama tatra tavaiva śaktiḥ // AvBhBhS_60
analyzed: grastasya viklava dhiyaḥ pravimukti hetoḥ yat kṛtyam atra mama tatra tava eva śaktiḥ

original: yā sā jagatparibhavasya nimittabhūtā hetuḥ svayaṃ surapater api lāghavasya /
analyzed: yā sā jagat paribhavasya nimitta bhūtā hetuḥ svayam surapateḥ api lāghavasya

original: sā māṃ viḍambayati nātha sadaiva tṛṣṇā bhindhi prasahya bhagavan na punarbhavāya // AvBhBhS_61
analyzed: sā mām viḍambayati nātha sadā eva tṛṣṇāḥ bhindhi prasahya bhagavat na punarbhavāya

original: yenāvṛtaḥ paśur ayaṃ hṛtabodhaśaktis tattvaṃ na vetti jagate hitam ātmane vā /
analyzed: yena āvṛtaḥ paśuḥ ayam hṛta bodha śaktiḥ tattvam na vetti jagate hitam ātmane vā

original: chindhi prasahya bhagavan mama tat samastam ajñānajaṃ timiram astu mahāprakāśaḥ // AvBhBhS_62
analyzed: chindhi prasahya bhagavat mama tat samastam ajñāna jam timiram astu mahā prakāśaḥ

original: sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam asvatantram āsannapātam avivekam asārasaṃjñam /
analyzed: sarva āpadām nilayam adhruvam asvatantram āsanna pātam avivekam asāra saṃjñam

original: yāvac charīrakam idam na vipadyate me tāvan niyojaya vibho kuśalakriyāsu // AvBhBhS_63
analyzed: yāvat śarīrakam idam na vipadyate me tāvat niyojaya vibho kuśala kriyāsu

original: yat khidyate kamalayonir api stuvānaḥ sākṣāc caturbhir api nāma mukhair bhavantam /
analyzed: yat khidyate kamalayoniḥ api stuvānaḥ sākṣāt caturbhiḥ api nāma mukhaiḥ bhavantam

original: tat ke vayaṃ tava guṇastavanakriyāsu bhaktiḥ pramāṇam iti sarvam idaṃ kṣamasva // AvBhBhS_64
analyzed: tat ke vayam tava guṇa stavana kriyāsu bhaktiḥ pramāṇam iti sarvam idam kṣamasva

original: kṛtvā mayā tava nutiṃ jagadekabandho bhaktyā svabuddhisadṛśīm avadhūtanāmna /
analyzed: kṛtvā mayā tava nutim jagat ekabandho bhaktyā sva buddhi sadṛśīm avadhūta nāmnaḥ

original: puṇyaṃ yad alpam api kiṃcid upāttam atra lokasya tena bhagavaṃs tvayi bhaktir astu // AvBhBhS_65
analyzed: puṇyam yat alpam api kiṃcid upāttam atra lokasya tena bhagavan tvayi bhaktiḥ astu  /

original: iti śrīmadavadhūtasiddhaviracitaṃ bhagavadbhaktistotraṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrīmat avadhūta siddha viracitam bhagavat bhakti stotram samāptam
